hero.title: Isoart - EPS and PIR Solutions for Civil Construction

defaults.heroDescription: Discover the ideal solution for efficient roofs with superior thermal insulation.
defaults.categoryDescriptionTitle: Isoart Thermal Roofing offers lightness, economy and excellent thermal performance, optimizing construction and ensuring comfort at lower cost.
defaults.categoryDescriptionText: Isoart Thermal Roofing is a lightweight and efficient solution for civil construction, replacing traditional systems with advantages. Produced with expanded polystyrene (EPS) or polyisocyanurate (PIR) cores and galvalume steel coating, it provides lighter structures, reduced foundation load and greater construction agility. In addition to excellent thermal performance, it allows significant savings in concrete, steel and labor, being ideal for projects that require productivity, comfort and cost-effectiveness.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Learn how ISOART protects and uses your personal data:

content.intro1: Isoart Industry of Thermal and Construction Products LTDA. and its affiliated companies of its economic group (together "ISOART") uses cookie technology to provide a better and more personalized service. This Cookie Policy ("Policy") is an integral part of our Privacy Policy.
content.intro2: The terms of this Policy apply to all Users and visitors of our website (hereinafter referred to as "Site") with the objective of informing, in a clear and objective manner, about the use of cookies on them.
content.intro3: For more information about how ISOART processes your Personal Data, please consult our Privacy Policy on the website www.isoart.com.br.
content.intro4: When accessing our Site for the first time, Users and visitors are informed through a text notice ("banner") regarding the cookie practice of the Sites.
content.definitionsDesc: For the purposes of this Policy, the following definitions and descriptions must be considered for your better understanding, when referred to in uppercase or lowercase, plural or singular, with or without bold:
content.personalData: Personal Data: any information related to an identified or identifiable natural person;
content.treatment: Treatment: every operation performed with Personal Data, such as those referring to collection, production, reception, classification, use, access, reproduction, transmission, distribution, processing, archiving, storage, elimination, evaluation or control of information, modification, communication, transfer, diffusion or extraction;
content.user: User (or Users): all natural or legal persons registered who interact with the functionalities offered by ISOART;
content.logs: Logs: records of visitor and User activities verified on the Site.
content.cookiesDesc: Cookies are considered small files, text or image, captured on our Sites, stored on devices used by Users who access them (for example, computers, tablets, smartphones, etc.), where they are recorded for subsequent retransmission to the same Sites when this user visits them again.
content.purposeDesc1: Cookies perform many different functions, such as allowing you to navigate between pages efficiently, store your preferences, and generally improve your browsing experience.
content.purposeDesc2: They can also help personalize advertisements displayed during browsing and marketing activities targeted at Users or visitors, ensuring they are sent according to their interests and preferences.
content.managementDesc1: Most Internet browsers are configured by default to automatically accept cookie installation. However, most browsers allow cookie management to meet your preferences.
content.managementDesc2: Users and visitors can also regularly remove all cookies that are already on their devices by clearing their browser history. This will remove all cookies from all visited sites. However, be aware that if you disable cookies that we use in your browser, it is possible that certain sections or features of our Sites will not work.
content.managementDesc3: If Users or visitors use different devices to view and access our Site, they must ensure that each browser on each device is adjusted to meet their cookie preferences.
content.managementDesc4: For cookie management, the means to configure each browser are different. Therefore, below is a list of methods offered by the main browsers to allow Users or visitors to manage cookie settings in their browser:
content.moreInfo: For more information about cookie configuration, visit:
content.note: Please note that this list does not contain all browsers, please consult the "Settings" or "Support" sections of your browser.
content.revocation: In this way, you can revoke consent for data use at any time, without, however, making the processing of this data illegitimate based on that consent, until the date of effective revocation.
content.cookiesUsedDesc: The Cookies used by our Sites perform the following functions, as mentioned below:
content.functionalDesc: Functional Cookies allow us to record the options that Users and visitors select on our Sites, for example, language, remember username/password and preferences. With this information we can provide more personalized functionality to Users and visitors who browse our Sites.
content.analyticsDesc: These Cookies allow us to collect information about how you use our site, and are used to help us understand how you interact with our site, so we can offer a better user experience – for example, evaluate our site's performance, or test different design ideas for the site. We may work with third parties to perform these services for us, so these Cookies may be set by a third party.
content.structuralDesc: These Cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled from our systems. As a rule, these cookies are pre-defined in response to service requests. In some situations, parts of the website may stop working.
content.marketingDesc: These Cookies are used for online behavioral advertising, consequently generating information so that users receive personalized content.
content.dartCookie: Dart Cookie – Google, as a third-party provider, uses cookies to display ads on sites. With the Dart Cookie, Google can require ads based on visits the reader has made to this and other sites on the internet. You can disable the Dart cookie by visiting Google's ad settings.
content.webBeacons: Web Beacons – We use these cookies to store information. For example, personal preferences when visiting sites.
content.thirdPartyDesc: The ISOART website may maintain connections with other sites that complement or contain useful information and tools for visitors, while if visitors and users access them, this privacy policy does not extend to third parties, and we are not responsible for the privacy policy or content of those.
content.rightsDesc: The rights of the data subject are safeguarded, especially: access to data; correction of incomplete, inaccurate or outdated data; confirmation of the existence of processing; anonymization, blocking or elimination of unnecessary, excessive data or data processed in non-compliance with the provisions of the General Data Protection Law (Law 13.709 of August 14, 2018); portability of data to another service or product provider, upon express request and observing commercial and industrial secrets; elimination of processed personal data; information on sharing data with public or private entities; information about the consequences of not providing consent and revocation of consent.
content.validityDesc: This Privacy Policy will remain in effect for an indefinite period.
content.contactDesc: If you have any questions or comments about this Cookie Policy, please contact us through our Relationship Channel on the website

headline.title: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) and Polyisocyanurate Rigid Foam (PIR): thermal efficiency, sustainability and technology for modern constructions.

eps.title: EPS: Efficiency and Sustainability
eps.description: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), popularly known as Styrofoam, is a lightweight and versatile material, widely used for its thermal and acoustic insulation properties. Additionally, it is 100% recyclable and does not emit substances harmful to the environment, making it a sustainable choice for various applications.
eps.subtitle: Main benefits of EPS:
eps.applicationsDescription: Used in thermal and acoustic insulation, packaging, civil construction, decoration and other applications. Ideal for commercial, industrial and residential buildings, ensuring energy efficiency, comfort and protection.

pir.title: PIR: High Technology and Safety
pir.description: Polyisocyanurate (PIR) is a high-performance insulating material, mainly used in the manufacture of thermal tiles and panels. Produced in an automated continuous line, PIR ensures superior thermal insulation and high fire resistance, being essential for industrial, commercial and residential projects.
pir.subtitle: Main benefits of PIR:

benefits.benefit6: Sustainable, in compliance with the Montreal Protocol

pirApplications.title: PIR Applications:
pirApplications.description: For covering and/or closing industrial and commercial buildings and warehouses, such as supermarkets, shopping centers, distribution and storage centers, hospitals, agribusiness, gyms and industries in general, including residences.

revestimentos.title: Types of coatings and Colors
revestimentos.description: Isoart PIR tiles and panels are available in different types of coatings and colors, ensuring flexibility in choice to meet the specific needs of each project.

tipos.filmeAluminio: Aluminum film with white or black face

revestimentos.aviso: Standard White RAL 9003. Other colors are suggestions, availability upon request.

linhaProducao.title: Automated production for maximum efficiency
linhaProducao.description: Isoart PIR tiles and panels are manufactured in a continuous and fully automated line, ensuring high precision, quality and sustainability. With Polyisocyanurate (PIR) insulating core and galvalume steel sheet coating, the process includes high-pressure injection, continuous pressing and automated cutting, ensuring excellent adhesion, finish and standardization. All products are automatically cooled, stacked and packaged, ready for shipping.

sustentabilidade.title: EPS Recycling: sustainability and intelligent reuse.
sustentabilidade.description: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), popularly known as Styrofoam®, is a widely used and 100% recyclable material. Although not biodegradable, its recycling prevents environmental impacts by reducing the volume of waste in landfills.
sustentabilidade.aviso: Isoart has two internal recycling centers where it fully reuses the generated waste, reinforcing its commitment to sustainability.

incendio.title: PIR: The protective shield against fire propagation
incendio.description: The performance of Polyisocyanurate (PIR) in fire situations is one of its greatest differentiators, offering an essential passive protection layer for any building. Unlike other materials, PIR does not contribute to flame propagation.
incendio.description2: When exposed to fire, the PIR panel core reacts uniquely: it forms a stable and insulating carbonized layer on its surface. This carbon barrier acts as a protective shield, performing three crucial functions:

bloco1.legenda: The carbonized layer significantly retards material burning, containing the fire focus and preventing flames from spreading through the structure

bloco2.legenda: It isolates the rest of the panel from intense heat, maintaining structural integrity for longer

bloco3.legenda: Contributes to keeping escape routes more visible and safe

incendio.teste: The test shown in the images proves this efficiency. Even under the direct action of a 30kW burner for 30 minutes, the fire remained restricted to the contact area. In the end, the result was only superficial carbonization, with the rest of the panel intact and without any fire propagation, demonstrating why PIR is the safest and smartest choice for your project.

heroHeadline.title: Innovative, sustainable and high-quality solutions in
heroHeadline.description: that meet the diverse demands of the market.

video.title: Isoart Institutional Video
video.caption: Since 2008, Isoart has been leading the market for innovative and sustainable solutions in Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) and Rigid Polyisocyanurate Foam (PIR), serving the most diverse demands of industries, constructions and other applications. With an unwavering commitment to quality, innovation and sustainability, the company has consolidated its position as a national reference in the sector.

timeline.title: A history marked by great successes:

2008.label: the first steps
2008.description: Founded in Santa Tereza do Oeste, Paraná, Isoart began its journey with the purpose of offering innovative and sustainable solutions in Expanded Polystyrene (EPS). From the first moment, the company established a commitment to quality and transparency, serving different sectors with excellence and building a solid foundation of trust in the market.

2015.label: A new chapter
2015.description: The expansion to Xanxerê, Santa Catarina, marked a decisive point in Isoart's history. The inauguration of Factory 2 brought new opportunities, consolidating the company as one of the main EPS transforming industries in Brazil. This unit not only increased production capacity, but also reinforced the commitment to sustainability by focusing on industrialization and recycling of EPS products.

2021.label: Expand project
2021.description: With the launch of the expand project, Isoart inaugurated the modern Factory 3 in Santa Tereza do Oeste, Paraná. This facility represents a milestone in the company's evolution, designed to meet the demands of modern and sustainable constructions. Equipped with cutting-edge technology, Factory 3 produces thermal roofing and isopanels in continuous line, with insulating cores in Rigid Polyisocyanurate Foam, PIR, or EPS.

map.title: Service throughout Brazil, Paraguay and Uruguay.
map.description: Isoart has 3 strategically located factories in the western regions of Paraná and Santa Catarina, ensuring complete coverage throughout Brazilian, Paraguayan and Uruguayan territory with excellence and quality.

missao.title: Mission
missao.description: To satisfy customer needs, exceeding their expectations, through excellence in the manufacture and distribution of EPS products, generating innovative solutions, with profitability and respect for the environment.

visao.title: Vision
visao.description: To be recognized as the reference company in the sector in which it operates, adding social and economic value, within ethical and sustainable principles.

valores.title: Values
valores.description: Commitment to quality, excellence in service, respect for the environment, transparency in actions, valuing life, innovation and boldness.

quality.title: Quality policy
quality.description1: The Isoart Group, through the Quality Policy, establishes the guidelines by which it declares its commitment to customer, employee and community satisfaction.
quality.description2: In this sense, we seek continuous improvement of the Quality Management System, basing our actions on the following premises:

items.item1: Ensure customer satisfaction by offering quality products and services.
items.item2: Share our values, building lasting partnerships that result in gains for both parties.
items.item3: Maintain a good work environment, valuing safety and respect for life.
items.item4: Seek continuous improvement and process control via performance indicators, favoring the achievement and maintenance of competitive advantages.
items.item5: Promote sustainable actions aiming at minimal environmental impact.
items.item6: Train and qualify all employees to comply with the Quality Policy.
